channel.title: CVE Feed for Siemens AG -- EN100 Ethernet module IEC 61850 variant
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siemens AG -- EN100 Ethernet module IEC 61850 variant

item.title: CVE-2018-4838|2024-08-05T05:18:26.631Z -- siemens%20ag -- en100%20ethernet%20module%20iec%2061850%20variant
item.description: A vulnerability has been identified in EN100 Ethernet module IEC 61850 variant (All versions < V4.30), EN100 Ethernet module DNP3 variant (All versions < V1.04), EN100 Ethernet module PROFINET IO variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module Modbus TCP variant (All versions), EN100 Ethernet module IEC 104 variant (All versions < V1.22). The web interface (TCP/80) of affected devices allows an unauthenticated user to upgrade or downgrade the firmware of the device, including to older versions with known vulnerabilities.
